article: ingredientspork - 700 gmushrooms-300 gcheese-100 gnuts-50 gorange-1-2 pcshoney - 2 tablespoonssoy sauce-3-4 the pig 's neck lengthwise , without cutting to the end of 2-3 cm , to get a book . meat is good to discourage , salt , pepper , sprinkle with spices . twist and remove for 3-4 hours in the refrigerator . we take out the meat , unfold . nuts grind in a blender . sprinkle the meat with nuts . cut the mushrooms and stew for a couple of minutes with a little oil . give to cool and put on the nuts .

cheese cut into plates and put on the mushrooms . turn off the roll , tightly wrapped thread . lubricate with vegetable oil and wrap in two layers of foil . wrap so that you can then easily open the top and the liquid does not flow out . bake in a preheated oven for about 1 hour . for sauce : mix zest and juice of one orange , soy sauce and honey . put the mixture on the stove and cook for minutes . an hour later , we get the meat open top and pour the sauce on our roll .
bake for another 20-30 minutes , periodically watering the juice . we take out our roll and let stand for 10-15 minutes , cut in portions . garnish at will . bon appetit !
